1.title: Amy
1.plot: Amy, a young woman from DC, has been living a double life for the past 15 years. It's now time to overcome her fear and share her true identity with friends.

2.title: Alexia
2.plot: Alexia has been keeping a dangerous secret from those closest to her. Overwhelmed by her job and responsibilities, Alexia must come clean to her family and ask for the help she needs to get her life back on track.

3.title: Cleo
3.plot: Cleo, a former truck driver and busy mom, has been hiding a secret from her family for decades. No longer ashamed, she is ready to reveal the truth to her family so they can move forward together.

4.title: Quincy
4.plot: Quincy loves her tight knit family and hometown, New York, but she has been keeping a secret about her seemingly glamorous life in the City. Now she's ready to reveal the truth to her family, and hopefully move forward with their support.

5.title: Vernon
5.plot: Vernon wants a normal life with a good job and bright future, but he has a secret that's been holding him back. As he tries to move on from his past, Vernon must take the first step by telling the truth to those closest to him.

6.title: Amber and Alex
6.plot: Military veterans and young parents, Amber and Alex, are hiding a secret. Overwhelmed by life outside the military and the pressure of raising two young kids, they know it's time to share the secret that's been affecting the whole family.

7.title: Katie H.
7.plot: Young and busy model, Katie, always wears a smile, but she's been hiding a debilitating secret from the world. Her secret is starting to affect her work and personal relationships and she must reveal the truth now to get the help she needs.

8.title: Daniel C.
8.plot: Daniel is keeping a secret from his parents and it's driving their relationship further and further apart. After years of hiding, Daniel is finally ready to take the risk and reveal his secret so he can finally be his true self with his family.

9.title: Jessica
9.plot: Jessica, a young comedian living in Los Angeles, has been keeping a dangerous secret from everyone. As she tries to take the next step in her life, Jessica knows she must reveal her secret before her life spins out of control.

10.title: Daniel G.
10.plot: Daniel, a young college student living in New York City, is hiding something from his parents. Excited about his new life, he has a strong desire to reveal this secret that is going to change everything.

11.title: Javier
11.plot: Javier is a naturally exuberant and loving person with a close group of friends and co-workers, but he has hidden a secret about his background for years. He's finally ready to reveal his secret to shed light on the often-divisive immigration debate.

12.title: Jason
12.plot: Jason, a dancer living in Los Angeles, has a secret. Raised in a traditional Korean family, Jason decided to take a different path in life than his parents had planned for him and now he must come clean to his family or jeopardize his dream career.

13.title: Yaya
13.plot: Yaya, a busy and loving mother of four, has been hiding a debilitating secret almost her entire life. Nervous about her future, Yaya has to reveal her secret to her boyfriend now or face losing him forever.

14.title: Furkan and Joana
14.plot: Furkan and Joana, a young couple living in San Diego, are hiding a secret from their families. They fear their secret might drive a wedge between them and their parents, but their future depends on revealing the truth now.

15.title: Steven
15.plot: Steven has been struggling to keep an unhealthy secret from his loved ones. As his life slips out of control, Steven fears that revealing his secret might rip apart his marriage, but he must tell the truth now or risk losing everything.

16.title: Byron
16.plot: Byron has a secret he's been keeping from his mother and friends. Ready to make a big change in his life, Byron knows that it's the right time to reveal the secret he's been unwilling to share.

17.title: Denise
17.plot: Denise, an administrative assistant and mom living in San Diego, has a secret she's been holding onto for years. Now she sees her son struggling in his own life and knows telling her secret is the best way to help him.

18.title: Sarah
18.plot: Sarah, a young hardworking teacher, is keeping a secret from her family. Struggling to live on a teachers' budget in Las Vegas, Sarah knows now is the time to reveal her secret and seek the support she needs from those closest to her.

19.title: Robert
19.plot: Robert has a secret he's afraid to share about his health. After struggling to come to terms with his secret, Robert is ready to come clean with his family and move forward with a new beginning.

20.title: Auggie
20.plot: Auggie has been keeping a secret for almost 30 years. Raising his daughter as a single father, Auggie now sees her walking the same wrong path and must reveal his secret before it's too late.

1.title: Jack
1.plot: Jack, a TV script coordinator, is lonely and looking to find that special someone. But before he can find true happiness Jack must reveal to his co-workers and friends a problem that has prevented him from moving on with his life.

2.title: Scarly
2.plot: Scarly is a full-time college student who just wants to live the American dream. When she was 17, she learned something about herself that would make achieving that dream nearly impossible. She's now prepared to reveal this secret to her classmates.

3.title: Kenny
3.plot: Kenny, a fashion consultant living and working in Los Angeles, CA, has been hiding a huge part of his life for the past two years. He is now ready to reveal his secret to his friends in LA and family in Nigeria.

4.title: Erma
4.plot: Erma is a senior in college studying psychology. With graduation around the corner and a new chapter of her life about to begin, it's time for her to reveal a secret she's been hiding from her friends and family.

5.title: Jean
5.plot: Jean, like many members of her family, is plagued with a secret. She'll need help from her children, friends, and the rest of her family to get through it, but first she needs to find the courage to tell them.

6.title: Alyssa
6.plot: Alyssa, a busy and hard working dance teacher, has a secret that she's been keeping from her friends. Afraid that her secret damages her close friendships and social life, Alyssa is ready to reveal what she must do in order to keep her family afloat.

7.title: Cayes
7.plot: Cayes, a behavioral interventionist, has struggled with a secret as long as he can remember. After years of hiding it out of shame, he's decided that it's finally time to take charge and reveal his secret to his friends and the rest of the world.

8.title: Travis
8.plot: Travis has maintained a secret since he was a child that follows him everywhere he goes. He's now at a point in life where it's time to share this secret with the world to help him move on and help others through the same process.

9.title: Mike
9.plot: Mike, a blue-collar worker from Alaska, has been hiding a life-changing secret for the past two years from his family, friends, and daughter. He's finally ready to tell them what he's been keeping so safely guarded.

10.title: Katherine
10.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

imdb.plot outline: Thousands of people hold onto life-altering secrets every day " many of which shed light on greater issues plaguing this country. Gut wrenching and all consuming, these secrets have drastic, permanent repercussions if revealed. But at a certain point, they become too big to hold onto. The reveals are illuminating. There's no going back. And for the first time, these intimate moments are captured in the most intimate way. Secret Lives of Americans is a groundbreaking format that takes an unflinching look at people's lives as they expose their powerful secrets to friends, family, significant others, co-workers, teachers, and mentors " the most influential people in their lives. This is their confession, their story to tell, so using cameras, cell phones, and laptops; they'll document the reveals and fallout themselves. With access that a camera crew would find impossible, we'll immerse ourselves in their lives as they hit the record button or pass the camera to their most trusted friend to capture the action. And as their journey unfolds, viewers come to understand their story within the context of a greater social issue. A Muslim woman, who has been hiding her religion and culture from the world since 9/11, reflects upon current affairs in our nation. A mother who secretly never learned how to read reminds audiences that illiteracy is still an issue to be remedied even in present day. Each story is illuminated with archival, documentary, and news footage that illustrates the bigger picture in present America. Through these personal stories, we will shed light on the pressing issue of the day. Viewers come away from each episode moved and informed, seeing a significant issue played out at a micro level. From the most spine-tingling to the most heart-warming moments you could imagine, each episode's subject captures their own story as they come clean and move forward.
